quote: Sin feels like freedom, until you try to stop.

Desire is the root of all suffering.
Suffering is the root of all greatness.
author: Buddhism & Nietzschean Philosophy

quote: Why not give it a 100% the first time?
The true test of leadership is how well you function in a crisis.
author: Brian Tracy

quote: When God wanted to make a king out of David, He sent him Goliath, not a crown.
He who has a why to live for can bear almost anything.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: The mystery of human existence lies not in just staying alive, but in finding someone to live for.
author: Fyodor Dostoevsky

quote:
Where attention goes, reality grows.
Are you creating chaos or peace?
Men are happiest when they're improving themselves physically, mentally, and financially. An idle man is a depressed man.
Never give up, never surrender!
We were taught to memorize answers, but not to question questions.
author: Socrates

quote: The best way to keep a prisoner from escaping is to make sure he never knows he's in prison.
author: Fyodor Dostoevsky

quote: History is a set of lies agreed upon.
author: Napoleon Bonaparte

quote: The more stupid one is, the closer one is to reality...
author: Fyodor Dostoevsky

quote:
Wrong is wrong, even if everyone is doing it. 
Right is right, even if no one is doing it.

Mathematics is the language of the universe.
Science is the law of the universe.
In chess, white and black pieces are bitter enemies, but those who move the pieces are usually good friends.
Panem et circenses
author: Juvenalis

quote: It's always the people going nowhere that have something to say.
Be the change you want to see in the world.
To learn who rules over you, simply find out who you are not allowed to critize.
author: Voltaire

quote: Prepare and prevent, don't repair and repent.
If voting made any difference they wouldn't let us do it.
Telling the truth is crazy in a world full of lies.
author: Ye

quote: Clutching a rose too tightly, you bleed from it's thorns...
Those who were seen dancing were thought to be insane by those who couldn't hear the music.
author: Nietzsche

quote: You can discover more about a person in an hour of play than in a year of conversation.
author: Plato

quote: Yào bû bùrú shí bû, shí bû bùrú Qì bû. (Medicine is not as good as food, food is not as good as Qì.)
author: TCM

quote: Rénhuó yîkoû Qì. (Human beings live on Qì.)
author: TCM

quote: Jesus isn't crucified for saying he was the son of god, but for showing us we all are.
